column4: Anyone familiar with bind setup on dapper?  I'm having trouble with te named.conf.local file.
thats more of a bind issue than ubuntu
can you look through http://doc.gwos.org/index.php/DNSServerBind and see if you see anything screwy with the /etc/bind/named.conf.local setup?
huh?
you'll have to paste your named.conf.local file
unless of course your copy/pasting form the howto?
http://rafb.net/p/XOaNG543.html   Line 3 is the problem
do you have a file named domainname.come.db ?
yes, and also the arpa one
and they have the proper permissions? (I just dont know the parse order for bind so elimintaing everything)
Well I just chowned them both so bind owned them, and still same error.
what exact error is bind spitting at you?
expected quoted string.  Forget it, I'm starting over.
ohh, you got whitespace!
or if you want something more robust than bind, look@ pdns.
is that apt-able?
bind is the biggest wench
yeah it is, I dont know why it didnt showup
do 'apt-cache search pdns'  you'll see it.

it also has a sql backend, so you can make domain changes on the fly, and I'll plug myself here http://sourceforge.net/projects/publicdnsadmin/  is a php frontend for managing zones. (Im the developer)
got it already.  Thanks.  I was hoping to get tinydns up but had some issues with that as well

well, I'll plug myself to then... openinvoice on sourceforge is a series of bash scripts with a OpenOffice frontend and a mysql backend that is a FIFO inventorying system.  Feel free to make the whole thing php! :)
